songs.title: Judas (DJ White Shadow Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
(Gaga...)

[Drop 1]
I'll bring him down
Bring him down, down, down, down
I'll bring him down
Bring him down, down, down, down

[Drop 2]
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
I'm in love with Juda-as, Juda-as
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
I'm in love with Juda-as, Juda-as
Judas, Juda-ah-ah

[Drop 3]
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
Ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah

[Drop 1]
I'll bring him down
Bring him down, down, down, down
I'll bring him down
Bring him down, down, down, down

[Outro]
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
Judas, Juda-ah-ah
